verses.verse: Now there<WG1161> were some<WG5100> present<WG3918> at<WG1722> the same time<WG2540> who<WG846> told<WG518> him<WG846> about<WG4012> the Galileans,<WG1057> whose<WG3739> blood<WG129> Pilate<WG4091> had mixed<WG3396> with<WG3326> their<WG846> sacrifices.<WG2378>

Jesus<WG2424> answered<WG2036> them,<WG846> "Do you<WG1380> think that<WG3754> these<WG3778> Galileans<WG1057> were<WG1096> worse sinners<WG268> than all<WG3956> the other Galileans,<WG1057> because<WG3754> they suffered<WG3958> such things?<WG5108>
I tell<WG3004> you,<WG5213> no,<WG3780> but<WG235> unless<WG1437> <WG3361> you repent,<WG3340> you will<WG622> all<WG3956> perish<WG622> in the same way.<WG5615>

Or<WG2228> those<WG1565> eighteen,<WG1176> <WG2532> <WG3638> on<WG1722> whom<WG3739> the tower<WG4444> in<WG1909> Siloam<WG4611> fell,<WG4098> and<WG2532> killed<WG615> them;<WG846> do you<WG1380> think that<WG3754> they<WG3778> were<WG1096> worse<WG3844> offenders<WG3781> than all<WG3956> the men<WG444> who dwell<WG2730> in<WG1722> Jerusalem?<WG2419>
I tell<WG3004> you,<WG5213> no,<WG3780> but,<WG235> unless<WG1437> <WG3361> you repent,<WG3340> you will<WG622> all<WG3956> perish<WG622> in the same way.<WG3668>"

He spoke<WG3004> <WG1161> this<WG3778> parable.<WG3850> "A certain<WG5100> man had<WG2192> a fig tree<WG4808> planted<WG5452> in<WG1722> his<WG846> vineyard,<WG290> and<WG2532> he came<WG2064> seeking<WG2212> fruit<WG2590> <WG1722> on it,<WG846> and<WG2532> found<WG2147> none.<WG3756>

<WG1161> He<WG2036> said to<WG4314> the vine dresser,<WG289> <WG2400> 'Behold, these three<WG5140> years<WG2094> I have come<WG2064> looking<WG2212> for fruit<WG2590> on<WG1722> this<WG3778> fig tree,<WG4808> and<WG2532> found<WG2147> none.<WG3756> Cut<WG1581> it<WG846> down.<WG1581> Why<WG2444> does<WG2532> it<WG3588> waste<WG2673> the soil?<WG1093>'

He<WG1161> answered,<WG611> <WG3004> <WG846> <WG2962> 'Lord, leave<WG863> it<WG846> alone<WG863> this<WG5124> year<WG2094> also,<WG2532> until<WG2193> <WG3755> I dig<WG4626> around<WG4012> it,<WG846> and<WG2532> fertilize<WG2874> it.<WG906>
If<WG2579><WG99999> it bears<WG4160> fruit,<WG2590> fine;<WG1161> but if<WG1487> not,<WG3361> after<WG1519> that,<WG3195> you can cut<WG1581> it<WG846> down.<WG1581>'"
He<WG1161> was<WG2258> teaching<WG1321> in<WG1722> one<WG1520> of the synagogues<WG4864> on<WG1722> the Sabbath day.<WG4521>

Behold,<WG2400> there was<WG2258> a woman<WG1135> who had<WG2192> a spirit<WG4151> of infirmity<WG769> eighteen<WG1176> <WG2532> <WG3638> years,<WG2094> and<WG2532> she was<WG2258> bent over,<WG4794> and<WG2532> could<WG1410> in<WG1519> no<WG3361> way<WG3838> straighten herself up.<WG352>
When<WG1161> Jesus<WG2424> saw<WG1492> her,<WG846> he called<WG4377> her,<WG2532> and said<WG2036> to her,<WG846> "Woman,<WG1135> you are freed<WG630> from your<WG4675> infirmity.<WG769>"
He<WG2532> laid<WG2007> his hands<WG5495> on her,<WG846> and<WG2532> immediately<WG3916> she stood up straight,<WG461> and<WG2532> glorified<WG1392> God.<WG2316>

The<WG1161> ruler of the synagogue,<WG752> being<WG611> indignant<WG23> because<WG3754> Jesus<WG2424> had healed<WG2323> on the Sabbath,<WG4521> said<WG3004> to the multitude,<WG3793> "There are<WG1526> six<WG1803> days<WG4521> in<WG1722> which men<WG3739> ought<WG1163> to work.<WG2038> Therefore<WG3767> come<WG2064> on those<WG3778> days<WG2250> and be healed,<WG2323> and<WG2532> not<WG3361> on the Sabbath<WG4521> day!<WG2250>"

Therefore<WG3767> the Lord<WG2962> answered<WG611> him,<WG846> <WG2532> "You hypocrites!<WG5273> <WG3089> Doesn't<WG3756> each one<WG1538> of you<WG5216> free<WG3089> his<WG846> ox<WG1016> or<WG2228> his donkey<WG3688> from<WG575> the stall<WG5336> on the Sabbath,<WG4521> and<WG2532> lead<WG520> him away<WG520> to water?<WG4222>

<WG1161> Ought<WG1163> not<WG3756> this woman,<WG3778> being<WG5607> a daughter<WG2364> of Abraham,<WG11> whom<WG3739> Satan<WG4567> had bound<WG1210> eighteen<WG1176> <WG2532> <WG3638> long<WG2400> years,<WG2094> be freed<WG3089> from<WG575> this<WG5127> bondage<WG1199> on the Sabbath<WG4521> day?<WG2250>"

As<WG2532> he<WG846> said<WG3004> these things,<WG5023> all<WG3956> his<WG846> adversaries<WG480> were disappointed,<WG2617> and<WG2532> all<WG3956> the multitude<WG3793> rejoiced<WG5463> for<WG1909> all<WG3956> the glorious<WG1741> things that<WG3588> were done<WG1096> by<WG5259> him.<WG846>
He<WG3004> said,<WG5101> "What is<WG2076> the Kingdom<WG932> of God<WG2316> like?<WG3664> To<WG2532> what<WG5101> shall I compare<WG3666> it?<WG846>

It is<WG2076> like<WG3664> a grain<WG2848> of mustard seed,<WG4615> which<WG3739> a man<WG444> took,<WG2983> and<WG2532> put<WG906> in<WG1519> his<WG1438> own garden.<WG2779> It<WG2532> grew,<WG837> and<WG2532> became<WG1096> <WG1519> a large tree,<WG1186> and<WG2532> the birds<WG4071> of the sky<WG3772> lodged<WG2681> in<WG1722> its<WG846> branches.<WG2798>"
<WG2532> Again<WG3825> he said,<WG2036> "To what<WG5101> shall I compare<WG3666> the Kingdom<WG932> of God?<WG2316>

It is<WG2076> like<WG3664> yeast,<WG2219> which<WG3739> a woman<WG1135> took<WG2983> and hid<WG1470> in<WG1519> three<WG5140> measures<WG4568> of flour,<WG224> until<WG2193> it<WG3739> was all<WG3650> leavened.<WG2220>"
He<WG2532> went<WG1279> on his way through<WG2596> cities<WG4172> and<WG2532> villages,<WG2968> teaching,<WG1321> and<WG2532> traveling<WG4160> <WG4197> on to<WG1519> Jerusalem.<WG2419>
<WG1161> One<WG5100> said<WG2036> to him,<WG846> "Lord,<WG2962> are they<WG1487> few<WG3641> who<WG3588> are saved?<WG4982>" He<WG1161> said<WG2036> to<WG4314> them,<WG846>

"Strive<WG75> to enter in<WG1525> by<WG1223> the narrow<WG4728> door,<WG4439> for<WG3754> many,<WG4183> I tell<WG3004> you,<WG5213> will seek<WG2212> to enter in,<WG1525> and<WG2532> will<WG2480> not<WG3756> be able.<WG2480>

When<WG575> once<WG3739><WG99999> the master of the house<WG3617> has risen up,<WG1453> and<WG2532> has shut<WG608> the door,<WG2374> and<WG2532> you begin<WG756> to stand<WG2476> outside,<WG1854> and<WG2532> to knock<WG2925> at the door,<WG2374> saying,<WG3004> <WG2962> 'Lord, Lord,<WG2962> open<WG455> to us!<WG2254>' then he will answer<WG611> and<WG2532> tell<WG2046> you,<WG5213> <WG3756> 'I don't know<WG1492> you<WG5209> or where<WG4159> you come from.<WG5209>'
Then<WG5119> you will begin<WG756> to say,<WG3004> <WG5315> 'We ate and<WG2532> drank<WG4095> in your<WG4675> presence,<WG1799> and<WG2532> you taught<WG1321> in<WG1722> our<WG2257> streets.<WG4113>'

He<WG2532> will say,<WG2046> <WG3004> 'I tell you,<WG5213> I don't<WG3756> know<WG1492><WG99999> where<WG4159> you come from.<WG2075> Depart<WG868> from<WG575> me,<WG1700> all<WG3956> you workers<WG2040> of iniquity.<WG93>'

There<WG1563> will be<WG2071> weeping<WG2805> and<WG2532> gnashing<WG1030> of teeth,<WG3599> when<WG3752> you see<WG3700> Abraham,<WG11> <WG2532> Isaac,<WG2464> <WG2532> Jacob,<WG2384> and<WG2532> all<WG3956> the prophets,<WG4396> in<WG1722> the Kingdom<WG932> of God,<WG2316> and<WG2532> yourselves<WG5209> being thrown<WG1544> outside.<WG1854>

They<WG2532> will come<WG2240> from<WG575> the east,<WG395> <WG2532> west,<WG1424> <WG2532> <WG575> north,<WG1005> and<WG2532> south,<WG3558> and<WG2532> will sit down<WG347> in<WG1722> the Kingdom<WG932> of God.<WG2316>

<WG2532> Behold,<WG2400> there are some who are<WG1526> last<WG2078> who<WG3739> will be<WG2071> first,<WG4413> and<WG2532> there are some who are<WG1526> first<WG4413> who<WG3739> will be<WG2071> last.<WG2078>"

On that same<WG846> day,<WG2250> some<WG5100> Pharisees<WG5330> came,<WG4334> saying<WG3004> to him,<WG846> "Get out<WG1831> of here,<WG2532> and go<WG4198> away,<WG4198> for<WG3754> Herod<WG2264> wants<WG2309> to kill<WG615> you.<WG4571>"

He<WG2532> said<WG2036> to them,<WG846> "Go<WG4198> and tell<WG2036> that<WG3778> fox,<WG258> <WG2400> 'Behold, I cast out<WG1544> demons<WG1140> and<WG2532> perform<WG2005> cures<WG2392> today<WG4594> and<WG2532> tomorrow,<WG839> and<WG2532> the third<WG5154> day I complete my mission.<WG5048>

Nevertheless<WG4133> I<WG3165> must<WG1163> go<WG4198> on my way today<WG4594> and<WG2532> tomorrow<WG839> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> next<WG2192> day,<WG3754> for it<WG1735> can't<WG3756> be<WG1735> that a prophet<WG4396> perish<WG622> outside of<WG1854> Jerusalem.<WG2419>'

"Jerusalem,<WG2419> Jerusalem,<WG2419> that<WG3588> kills<WG615> the prophets,<WG4396> and<WG2532> stones<WG3036> those who<WG3588> are sent<WG649> to<WG4314> her!<WG846> How often<WG4212> I wanted<WG2309> to gather<WG1996> your<WG4675> children<WG5043> together,<WG1996> like<WG3739> a<WG5158> hen<WG3733> gathers her<WG1438> own brood<WG3555> under<WG5259> her wings,<WG4420> and<WG2532> you<WG2309> refused!<WG3756>

Behold,<WG2400> your<WG5216> house<WG3624> is left<WG863> to you<WG5213> desolate.<WG2048> <WG1161> <WG281> I tell<WG3004> you,<WG3754> you will<WG1492> <WG3361> not<WG3756> see<WG1492> me,<WG3165> until<WG2193> <WG2240> <WG3753> you say,<WG2036> <WG2127> 'Blessed is he who<WG3588> comes<WG2240> in<WG1722> the name<WG3686> of the Lord!<WG2962>'"
